Text.Page:
We're lucky that Akia and Terkasia aren't giving the ossugon warchiefs orders anymoreâ€”all thanks to you. The {@LinkCreature:25#2011#ossugon warchiefs} will be easier to divide and eliminate without their leaders.

Make sure you bring back their skulls so they can't resurrect. Without the generals, their armies will scatter for sure.

This is a critical mission, . I can't think of anyone better to take on the generals. Our future rests on your shoulders.
That's how it's done! Without the generals, the remnants of the army don't dare proceed with their attack plans! You saved the day!
Hurry! Kill the {@LinkCreature:25#2011#ossugon warchiefs} before their army attacks!
